title: Successful Google Login via Firebase Authentication
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using Firebase Authentication with a valid Google account.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click the 'Login with Google' button.
Complete the Google account authentication flow with valid credentials.
Check that the user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the main interface.
Verify that the user's profile information is correctly loaded.

title: Google Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system handles failed login attempts appropriately when Google authentication fails or is cancelled.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click the 'Login with Google' button.
Cancel the Google authentication window or enter invalid credentials.
Verify that login fails and user remains on login page.
Check that a meaningful error message or notification is displayed to the user.

title: Successful Onboarding Modal Language and Content Preference Selection
description: Verify onboarding modal correctly captures user language and content type preferences and stores them.

steps.description: Login successfully and open the onboarding modal on first launch.
Select a language preference.
Select content type preferences.
Submit the onboarding form.
Verify that the selected preferences are saved and reflected in subsequent sessions.
Check that onboarding modal does not reappear on future logins.

title: AI Chat Interface Responds with Contextual Gemini API Responses
description: Verify that the AI chat interface correctly sends user inputs to Gemini API and displays appropriate, contextual AI-generated responses with clickable vocabulary words.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the AI Chat interface.
Input a valid message/question relevant to language learning.
Send the message.
Verify that a response is received from Gemini API.
Check that the response text matches the input context and is grammatically correct.
Confirm that vocabulary words in the response are clickable to open the WordCard popup.

title: WordCard Popup Opens and Displays Correct Details
description: Verify clicking vocabulary words in AI chat responses opens the WordCard popup showing word details correctly.

steps.description: Send an AI chat message containing vocabulary words.
Click on a vocabulary word in the AI chat response.
Check that the WordCard popup opens with the correct word.
Verify the popup displays the word definition, status, pronunciation button, and sentence storage options.

title: Radial Menu Updates Word Status and Important Flag Correctly
description: Verify the radial menu in WordCard component updates the selected word's state (Red, Yellow, Green, Important) correctly and persists changes.

steps.description: Open a WordCard popup.
Use the radial menu to change the word's status to each possible category and toggle the important flag.
Verify that the changes are immediately reflected in the UI.
Confirm that changes persist after closing and reopening the WordCard popup.
Verify that real-time Firestore sync updates other active sessions with the changes.

title: Pronunciation Audio Plays Correctly from WordCard
description: Verify the pronunciation audio feature in the WordCard plays the correct audio for the selected word.

steps.description: Open a WordCard popup.
Click the play pronunciation button.
Verify that the corresponding pronunciation audio plays with clear sound.
Ensure controls allow stopping or replaying the audio.

title: Saving Example Sentences in WordCard
description: Verify that users can enter and save example sentences related to a vocabulary word and that the sentences persist and appear appropriately.

steps.description: Open a WordCard popup.
Input a valid example sentence and save it.
Verify the sentence is displayed under the word's sentence storage section.
Close and reopen the WordCard popup and confirm the sentence persists.

title: Vocabulary Stacks Update and Synchronize in Real-Time
description: Verify that updates to vocabulary word status or added sentences reflect immediately in the vocabulary stacks and sync through Firebase Firestore across multiple devices.

steps.description: On device A, open a WordCard and update word status or add example sentences.
Check that the vocabulary stack counts in sidebar on device A update accordingly.
On device B logged in with same user, verify the stack counts and word data update in real-time without refresh.

title: Sidebar Navigation Shows Correct Vocabulary Stacks and Conversation History
description: Verify the sidebar component accurately displays current vocabulary stacks with real-time word counts and conversation histories.

steps.description: Login and navigate to main interface.
Check that sidebar displays navigation items including profiles, conversations, vocabulary stacks, and their real-time counts.
Validate that selecting an item navigates to the correct view or conversation.

title: Community Post Creation, Editing, and Persistence
description: Verify that users can create new posts, edit existing ones, and that changes persist and display correctly in the community feed.

steps.description: Navigate to community feed and click to create a new post.
Input valid post content and submit.
Verify the new post appears in the community feed with correct content and user info.
Select the created post and edit its content.
Submit the edited post.
Verify the edited content is updated and visible in the feed.

title: Community Post Commenting and Liking Functionality
description: Verify that users can comment on posts, like posts, and that these interactions are reflected correctly and persisted.

steps.description: Open a community post.
Add a comment and submit.
Verify the comment appears under the post.
Click the like button on the post.
Verify the like count increments and the like state is persistent.

title: User Profile Editing and Data Persistence
description: Verify that a user can edit their profile information and that changes persist and reflect correctly across the application.

steps.description: Navigate to the user profile page.
Edit profile details such as display name or avatar.
Save the changes.
Verify that the updated information persists after page refresh and is displayed correctly in community posts and chat.

title: Real-Time Global Chat Message Send and Receive
description: Verify that users can send messages in the global chat room and receive messages from others in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the global chat room.
Type and send a chat message.
Verify the message appears instantly in the chat.
Confirm messages sent by other users appear in real-time.

title: 1:1 Direct Chat Message Exchange and Synchronization
description: Verify that direct chat between two users functions correctly with sending, receiving, and real-time synchronization of messages.

steps.description: Open a 1:1 direct chat with another user.
Send a message.
Verify the message is displayed in the chat window immediately.
On the other user's device, confirm the message is received and displayed in real-time.

title: Error Handling for AI Chat Response Failure
description: Verify that when the Gemini API fails to return a response or returns an error, the AI chat interface handles this gracefully.

steps.description: Simulate Gemini API failure or network error.
Send a message in the AI chat interface.
Verify that an error notification or message is shown to the user.
Confirm the chat interface remains stable and allows resending messages.

title: Vocabulary Stack Filter Edge Cases
description: Verify the vocabulary stack filtering handles edge cases such as empty stacks, large numbers of words, and simultaneous updates from multiple sources.

steps.description: Navigate to vocabulary stacks with zero words.
Verify that the UI properly indicates empty stacks with no errors.
Load a vocabulary stack with a large number of words.
Verify that performance is acceptable and UI displays all items correctly.
Perform updates on word statuses from two different devices simultaneously.
Verify that changes synchronize correctly without data loss or conflict.

title: Logout and Session Termination
description: Verify that user logout terminates session properly and returns user to the login page.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Click the logout button.
Verify user session ends and user is redirected to login screen.
Verify cached user data is cleared and protected resources are inaccessible.
